mapper.select: SELECT C.tenant_id, B.system_id, B.authKey_use_yn, A.authKey, A.authKey_cd, A.issu_dt, A.expr_dt, C.status_cd as ten_status_cd, B.status_cd as sys_status_cd, A.status_cd as ath_status_cd FROM tbl_sac_authKey A LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_sac_system B ON A.system_id = B.system_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_sac_tenant C ON B.tenant_id = C.tenant_id WHERE A.authKey = #{authKey}
SELECT A.system_id, A.interface_id, A.status_cd FROM tbl_sac_auth A INNER JOIN tbl_sac_interface B ON A.interface_id = B.interface_id WHERE A.system_id = #{systemId} AND B.url = #{url}
